I am a Computer Engineer graduate from SUNY Stony Brook. As a computer engineer I have experience with both hardware description languages and programming languages.

More recently, I have been self-learning web development techniques and working on personal projects to further my software skills and to challenge myself.

About Me

Project Portfolio


4-Stage Pipeline Multimedia Unit

A multimedia unit that can process a set of instructions throughout "pipelines". Each pipeline refers to a stage in the unit that performs a specific task read from the initial instruction.

Languages: VHDL, C++

Alarm Clock

Programmed onto an ATtiny48 chip. This clock can display the seconds in binary format through six LED bulbs.

Languages: AVR Assembly

User3D

Capturing data using depth cameras to create 3-D models as well as provide health-related information.

Languages: MATLAB

Spit

Spit card game
Work in progress

Languages: JavaScript, HTML/CSS
